title: Small mission training center
description: Small meetings using the lessons from the missionary manual in 4 weeks. At the end, the young people do a day of sharing with the missionaries, including taking part in the meals and gospel teaching.

title: Happy cleaning day
description: The girls get in touch with the sisters who live on Relief Society alone and offer them a day of organizing and cleaning.

title: Walk in the park
description: Enjoy the outdoors with a group walk and picnic, with a message about health care

title: Princess day
description: An afternoon tea with snacks and drinks, where they will make a time capsule with their wishes for the future and learn about their divine potential.
